s.text: One predicts that Democrats will try to dump Clinton quickly if the allegations turn out to be true: They don't want him dragging the party down to defeat in 1998 or 2000 as Nixon did the Republicans in 1974.
The only satisfactory option: A ground invasion that deposes/kills him.
The editorial argues that Clinton has forfeited the second chance America gave him in 1992.
